comment: This app was perfect and has been converted to nightmare. Was there no user testing? . Biggest problem is it doesn't always does pinyin if Chinese to English or if using thesaurus (I don't know all the Chinese symbols). Back button doesn't take you to last selection now, it resets the input , so frustrating
